name: Alveari
description: A collection of VR mini-games! Slow motion action!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: AMD 390 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
